message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'll really like it. I'm offering it to you for $150.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a great product and I think you'll be happy with it at this price.
I'm still interested in the product, but $135 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $115.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  Let's meet in the middle at $125.  This is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
